page.title: 08FARM MACHINERY
page.content: The use of machinery on Westmoor Farm and Aislaby has reduced the labour force on these farms considerably.There is now only Mr.Hutchinson,his son and one farm labourer with occasional help in the busy season. They have on the farm:-(1)Three tractors the main one being used for ploughing and pulling trailers.(2)The combine harvesters,one on each farm used for collecting wheat ,barley and rape seed.(3)One hay elevator for lifting hay up when the pile becomes too high.(4)One seed drill for planting seeds.(5)One turnip lifter for taking the turnips out of the ground.(6)One muck spreader for spreading manure on the land.(7)Two ploughs.(8)Various harrows and cultivators.
